Once you've generated your salad bar, you'll have to save it to an image hosting site (such as imgur) and then modify your signature (under Settings). Putting it in your sig is just like adding any other image to the forum.

(They used to let you put a direct link to the ribbons you generated; it's not that way anymore on account of the site overloading its maximum threads or some such nonsense - the IP was being a bunch of jerks).
You don't need to use imgur. Just go to the signature page and click "upload signature image".

You don't need to use imgur. Just go to the signature page and click "upload signature image".
